stepresult.p: By default, the Open page appears.

step.cmd: In the Open page, select , and then select Time Based Event.

stepresult.p: The Add Time Based Event window appears, displaying a list of time-based Autolog sheets accessible to the logged-in user as configured in Plant Applications Administrator.

step.cmd: In the 1. Choose activity section, select an activity to create a time-based event on the selected activity.
In the 2. Add Event Detailssection, in the TIMESTAMP box, select a date and time.

info.note: The time stamp of the event must be within two hours from the current date and time.

step.cmd: In the COMMENT box, enter a comment for the event.

taskbody.result: The time-based event for the selected activity is added and an activity is automatically created for the event. The activity appears in the Open page.
